authenticators.title: Authenticators
authenticators.summary: Add authenticators to manage the types of authentication that users and administrators must complete to access the UES console, apps, or services.
authenticators.ES512: ECDSA using P521 Curve and SHA-512
authenticators.ES256: ECDSA using P256 Curve and SHA-256
authenticators.ES384: ECDSA using P384 Curve and SHA-384
authenticators.name: Name
authenticators.windowHelperText: Specify the maximum time drift that is allowed between the device and server.

common.name: Name
common.deleteConfirm: Do you want to delete the {{field}} authenticator?

failure.create: The authenticator could not be added. Reason: {{reason}}

failure.delete: The authenticator could not be deleted. Reason: {{reason}}
failure.read: The data could not be retrieved. Reason: {{reason}}

list.title: Enterprise Identity policies
list.pageDescription: Add a policy to specify the types of authentication that users and administrators must complete to access the UES console, apps, or services.

policy.applicationExceptionDescription: This setting will override any policies assigned to apps when it is assigned to users or groups. It does not apply if a policy is assigned as an app default policy.
policy.name: Name
policy.nameHelperText: A policy with this name already exists.

createPolicyAssignConfirmationDialog.title: Assign the authentication policy
createPolicyAssignConfirmationDialog.description: The policy has been created. Do you want to assign users or groups to this policy?

modifiedPolicyConfirmationDialog.title: Unsaved changes
modifiedPolicyConfirmationDialog.description: Do you want to leave this page? Your changes have not been saved.

batchDeletePolicyConflictErrorConfirmati.title: Delete failure
batchDeletePolicyConflictErrorConfirmati.description: The following policies could not be deleted because they are assigned to users or groups:

batchDeletePolicyErrorConfirmationDialog.title: Delete failure
batchDeletePolicyErrorConfirmationDialog.description: The following policies could not be deleted:

deletePolicyConfirmationDialog.title: Delete confirmation
deletePolicyConfirmationDialog.description: Do you want to delete the {{name}} policy?
deletePolicyConfirmationDialog.deleteNote: You must remove all users and groups associated with a policy before you delete it.

serverError.update: The changes could not be saved.
serverError.delete: The policy could not be deleted.
serverError.deleteWithUsers: The policy could not be deleted because it is assigned to users.
serverError.deleteWithGroups: The policy could not be deleted because it is assigned to groups.
serverError.deleteWithUsersAndGroups: The policy could not be deleted because it is assigned to users and groups.
serverError.deletePolicies: The policies could not be deleted.
serverError.multipleInternalAuthErrorMsg: You cannot assign more than one internal authenticator type in a policy.

selectManagedExceptionDialog.title: Manage app exceptions
selectManagedExceptionDialog.listLabel: You can configure authentication levels for the selected services in the tabs at the bottom of the page after you select your services.
